short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple Chrome extension that allows users to recall and write notes for sales calls.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Are you an SDR, BDR, Salesperson trying to get appointments?

This is an extension that allows you to store your sales pitches - ready to go in a few clicks!

It also allows you to write notes as you move closer to that deal or second meeting.
